content.rendered:
Months after the bloody fighting, thousands of dead are buried in the trenches. Jan Lozano, the captain of the Fifth Brigade, was captured by the enemy team along with a young driver while he was trying to complete a mission. When a new, unknown enemy appears on the scene, the rivals must band together and put aside their hatred for each other in order to survive.

Directors: Alberto de Toro. Javier Ruiz Caldera

Written By Jaime Marques. Cristian Conti. Manuel Martín

Stars: Miki Esparbé. Aura Garrido. Luis Callejo
